group_1.textLeft: Felicia, what are you doing?

group_1.textRight: Hang on a sec.
Stick this one here... [chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:motion_100:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]Yeah! That's perfect!

group_1.textLeft: Oh? What's this?

group_1.narration: WANTED@Anyone with deets about Mitama Yakumo,@please contact Felicia Mitsuki.@I'll trade you a Master Richie Decagon Ball@sticker for secrets about the Coordinator!

group_1.textRight: There! How's THAT!
This'll lay all your secrets bare, Mitama!

group_1.textLeft: Goodness gracious. So you're scrutinizing@me again?

group_1.textRight: 'Course I am!
You better watch out, 'cause I'm keepin' my@eyes peeled!

group_1.textCenter: Yes, I'm sure you are, but...
I could easily just take this poster down.
It's quite adorable though. Why not leave it?

group_1.textLeft: Hello, Mitama!

group_1.textRight: Hi there!

group_1.textCenter: Ah, if it isn't the flute fre... *Ahem*@If it isn't the twins!

group_1.textLeft: I believe you were about to call us the@flute freaks!

group_1.textRight: I didn't think you'd stoop to calling us@that, Mitama.

group_1.textCenter: I'm so sorry. I must've picked it up from@someone else.

group_1.textRight: Are there really that many people using that@nickname?

group_1.textLeft: Utterly tragic.

group_1.textRight: Hey, that's my line!

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, did the two of you come for some@Coordinator magic?

group_1.textRight: Oh, no. We actually...

group_1.textLeft: Ah, then you must be here to shop for goods@for fighting girls on the go!

group_1.textRight: We just paid a visit to check on your@well-being...

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean by that?

group_1.textRight: We heard that people have been snooping@around in your business as of late.

group_1.textLeft: "Snooping around"?
Oh, you mean this poster?

group_1.textRight: Ah!
So Felicia Mitsuki started this charade!
That is even more cause for concern!
Mitama, are you all right with this?

group_1.textLeft: I'm not worried about people learning details@about me they can easily find out by asking.
So you see...it's completely fine by me.

group_1.textRight: Are you certain?

group_1.textLeft: Tsukuyo?

group_1.textRight: There are still people who remember you at@Mizuna Girls' Academy.
If you leave Felicia to do as she pleases,@they may find out.

group_1.textLeft: Ah...I see.
You and I were classmates at school back @then, weren't we?

group_1.textRight: We were... So I remember what happened@back then.
Is it really okay to allow Felicia to do@this?

group_1.textLeft: Do you believe what they wrote about me?@In that article?

group_1.textRight: No, I do not.

group_1.textLeft: Then it's quite all right.
If there are people who know about what@happened and still trust me...
That is enough for me.
Ah, yes.
There's a favor related to that I'd like to@ask, Tsukuyo.

group_1.textRight: Oh, what is it?
